svg: {{name}}{% for i in range(end=lines + 1) %} {% set offset_x = padding + loop.index0/lines * width %} {% set offset_y = padding + loop.index0/lines * height %}{{ (lines - loop.index0)/lines * y_range + y_min | round(method="ceil", precision=2) }}{{ (loop.index0-lines)/lines * x_range + x_range + x_min | round(method="ceil", precision=2) }}{% if loop.index0 == lines %}{% endif %} {% if loop.index0 == 0 %}{% endif %} {% endfor %} {% for point in path %} {% set x = point.0 %} {% set y = point.1 %} {% if classes[loop.index0] == 0 %}{# red points are the outliers #} {% elif classes[loop.index0] == -1 %}{% else %} {% set color_index = classes[loop.index0]-1 %} {% set cluster_color = extra_colors[color_index] %}{% endif %} {% endfor %} {% for c in centers %} {% set x = c.0 %} {% set y = c.1 %}{% endfor %}
